posts.post_content:
Hey all,

I need four more cards to complete my SGC-graded set:  Ty Cobb (Bat Off), Ty Cobb (Green Portrait), Sam Crawford (Batting), and Cy Young (Portrait).  I may be the 1000th guy looking for a Green Cobb but at least I'm out there!  Looking for SGC-graded examples in the 30-50 range.  Please let me know if you have anything that fits.

Marty
